text:
The #COVID19 Dashboard has been updated: https://t.co/XhspoyTG79

On Monday 15 March, 5,089 new cases and 64 deaths within 28 days of a positive test were reported across the UK.

24,453,221 people have received the 1st dose of a #vaccine, and 1,610,280 have received a 2nd dose. https://t.co/WDTvo4ckBA
